participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

PTSDP_01.LongName: 1) Being in a big earthquake that badly damaged the building your child was in.

PTSDP_02.LongName: 2) Being in another kind of disaster, like a fire, tornado, flood or hurricane.

PTSDP_03.LongName: 3) Being in a bad accident, like a very serious car accident.

PTSDP_04.LongName: 4)Being in a place where a war was going on around your child.

PTSDP_05.LongName: 5)Being hit, punched, or kicked very hard at home. (DO NOT INCLUDE ordinary fights between brothers & sisters).

PTSDP_06.LongName: 6) Seeing a family member being hit, punched, or kicked very hard at home. (DO NOT INCLUDE ordinary fights between brothers & sisters).

PTSDP_07.LongName: 7) Being beaten up, shot at or threatened to be hurt badly in your town.

PTSDP_08.LongName: 8) Seeing someone in your town being beaten up, shot at or killed.

PTSDP_9.LongName: 9) Seeing a dead body in your town (do not include funerals).

PTSDP_10.LongName: 10) Having an adult or someone much older touch your child's private sexual body parts when your child did not want them to.

PTSDP_11.LongName: 11) Hearing about the violent death or serious injury or a loved one.

PTSDP_12.LongName: 12) Having painful and scary medical treatment in a hospital when your child was very sick or badly injured.

PTSDP_13.LongName: 13) OTHER than the situations described above, has ANYTHING ELSE ever happened to your child that was REALLY SCARY, DANGEROUS, OR VIOLENT?

PTSDP_14.LongName: Did you answer "YES" to ANY  of the above questions?

PTSDP_15.LongName: If you answered "YES" to only ONE thing in the above list of questions, pick the number from the list. If you answered "YES" to MORE THAN ONE THING, pick the number of the thing that BOTHERS YOUR CHILD THE MOST NOW:

Levels.6: 6-seeing a family member being hit, punched or kicked very hard at home
Levels.7: 7-being beaten up, shot at or threatened to be hurt badly
Levels.8: 8-seeing someone beaten up, shot or killed
Levels.10: 10-having an adult or someone much older touch your child's private sexual body parts
Levels.11: 11-hearing about the violent death or serious injury of loved one
Levels.13: 13-other really scary, dangerous, or violent situation

PTSDP_16.LongName: About how long ago did this bad thing happen to your child?

PTSDP_17.LongName: Was your child afraid that he/she would die?

PTSDP_18.LongName: Was your child afraid that he/she would be seriously injured?

PTSDP_20.LongName: Was your child afraid that someone else would die?

PTSDP_21.LongName: Was your child afraid that someone else would be seriously injured?

PTSDP_25.LongName: Did your child feel intense helplessness?

PTSDP_26.LongName: Did your child feel horrified; was what he/she saw disgusting or gross?

PTSDP_27.LongName: Did your child get hysterical or run around?

PTSDP_28.LongName: Did your child feel very confused?

PTSDP_29.LongName: Did your child feel like what was happening did not seem real in some way, like it was going on in a movie instead of real life?

PTSDP_30.LongName: My child watches out for danger or things that he/she is afraid of.

PTSDP_31.LongName: When something reminds my child of what happened he/she get very upset, scared or sad.

PTSDP_32.LongName: My child has upsetting thoughts, pictures, or sounds of what happened come into his/her mind when he/she do not want them to.

PTSDP_33.LongName: My child feels grouchy, angry or mad.

PTSDP_34.LongName: My child  has dreams about what happened or other bad dreams.

PTSDP_35.LongName: My child has flashbacks of what happened; he/she feels like he/she is back at the time when the bad thing happened, living through it again.

PTSDP_36.LongName: My child feels like staying by him/her self and not being with his/her friends.

PTSDP_37.LongName: My child feels alone inside and not close to other people.

PTSDP_38.LongName: My child tries not to talk about, think about, or have feelings about what happened.

PTSDP_39.LongName: My child has trouble feeling happiness or love.

PTSDP_40.LongName: My child has trouble feeling sadness or anger.

PTSDP_41.LongName: My child feels jumpy or startles easily, for example, when he/she hears a loud noise or when something surprises him/her.

PTSDP_42.LongName: My child has trouble going to sleep or wakes up often during the night.

PTSDP_43.LongName: My child feels that some part of what happened is his/her fault.

PTSDP_44.LongName: My child has trouble remembering important parts of what happened.

PTSDP_45.LongName: My child has trouble concentrating or paying attention.

PTSDP_46.LongName: My child tries to stay away from people, places, or things that make him/her remember what happened.

PTSDP_47.LongName: When something reminds my child of what happened, he/she has strong feelings in his/her body, like heart beating fast, head aches, or  stomach aches.

PTSDP_48.LongName: My child thinks that he/she will not live a long life.

PTSDP_49.LongName: My child is afraid that the bad thing will happen again.

PTSDP_50.LongName: My child plays games or draws pictures that are like some part of what happened.

PTSDP_51.Description: At least one “Yes” response to questions 1-13. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDP_01]+[PTSDP_02]+[PTSDP_03]+[PTSDP_04]+[PTSDP_05]+[PTSDP_06]+[PTSDP_07]+[PTSDP_08]+[PTSDP_9]+[PTSDP_10]+[PTSDP_11]+[PTSDP_12]+[PTSDP_13]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDP_52.Description: At least 1 “Yes” response to questions 17-28. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDP_17]+[PTSDP_18]+[PTSDP_19]+[PTSDP_20]+[PTSDP_21]+[PTSDP_22]+[PTSDP_23]+[PTSDP_24]+[PTSDP_25]+[PTSDP_26]+[PTSDP_27]+[PTSDP_28]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDP_53.Description: At least 1 “Yes” response to questions 24-28. | Calculation = iif ([PTSDP_24]+[PTSDP_25]+[PTSDP_26]+[PTSDP_27]+[PTSDP_28]>=1, 'YES','NO')

PTSDP_54.Description: Sum of scores of questions 1, 2, 4-9, 12, 13, 17-21, highest score from either 10 or 11, and highest score from either 3 or 23. | Calculation = [PTSDP_01]+[PTSDP_02]+[PTSDP_04]+[PTSDP_05]+[PTSDP_06]+[PTSDP_07]+[PTSDP_08]+[PTSDP_9]+[PTSDP_12]+[PTSDP_13]+[PTSDP_17]+[PTSDP_18]+[PTSDP_19]+[PTSDP_20]+[PTSDP_21]+ iif([PTSDP_03]>=[PTSDP_23],[PTSDP_03],[PTSDP_23])+iif([PTSDP_10]>=[PTSDP_11],[PTSDP_10],[PTSDP_11])

PTSDP_55.Description: Sum of scores of questions 34, 35, 31, 47 and highest score from either 32 or 50. | Calculation = [PTSDP_34]+[PTSDP_35]+[PTSDP_31]+[PTSDP_47]+ iif([PTSDP_32]>=[PTSDP_50],[PTSDP_32],[PTSDP_50])

PTSDP_56.Description: Sum of scores of questions 38, 46, 44, 36, 37, 48 and highest score from either question 39 or 40. | Calculation = [PTSDP_38]+[PTSDP_46]+[PTSDP_44]+[PTSDP_36]+[PTSDP_37]+[PTSDP_48]+iif([PTSDP_39]>=[PTSDP_40],[PTSDP_39],[PTSDP_40])

PTSDP_57.Description: Sum of scores of questions 42, 33, 45, 30, 41. | Calculation = [PTSDP_42]+[PTSDP_33]+[PTSDP_45]+[PTSDP_30]+[PTSDP_41]
